tests.name: AudioBookToString_test
tests.setup: g++ -isystem ./tests/googletest/include -std=c++14 -Wall -Wextra -pthread -lpthread src/Book.cpp src/Library.cpp src/Loan.cpp src/PrintedBook.cpp src/EBook.cpp src/AudioBook.cpp src/Patron.cpp src/Date.cpp tests/AudioBookToString_test.o tests/gtest_main.a -o AudioBookToString_test
